text: Siridapha is a genus of flies in the family Pyrgotidae. == Species == *S. filipalpis Enderlein, 1942 *S. mulunguensis Vanschuytbroeck, 1963 *S. ophionea Enderlein, 1942 == References == Category:Pyrgotidae Category:Diptera of Africa Category:Brachycera genera Category:Taxa named by Günther Enderlein
title: Siridapha
